divs: Sighting DetailsSEEN UNIT FLYING TOWARDS ME AT ABOUT 300-400 FEET AND STOP RIGHT ABOVE ME AND I STOPED MY TRUCK PUT WINDOW DOWN AND IT SAT ABOVE ME FOR APPROX 4 SECONDS, NO NOISE AT ALL . NO JET WASH NO PROP NOISE, LIGHTS OF SOME SORT ON BOTTOM APPROX A ROW OF TWO TWELVE TO FOURTEEN ON BOTTOM. I WAS A MAINLINE JET MECHANIC FOR US-AIRWAYS, I KNOW WHAT JET WASH IS AND THERE WAS NO NOISE AT ALL.
Summary: A PLANE TWICE THE SIZE OF A HERRIOR JET
